monster.name: Soldier Legionnaire
languages: Common and one Language of Choice

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the legionnaire can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the legionnaire that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The legionnaire has advantage on an attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the legionnaire's allies are within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Tactical Advantage
entries: The legionnaire has advantage on initiative. If it takes the Attack action against a creature that has not acted yet in combat, the legionnaire can make an additional glaive or crossbow attack on its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The legionnaire can make two weapon attacks with their glaive. They can substitute any number of glaive attacks for a crossbow attack

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, 10ft, one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slash damage

action.name: Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, 100/400ft, one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage

reaction.name: Retaliation
entries: When the legionnaire or a creature within 10ft. of the legionnaire is targeted with a melee attack while within 10ft. of the legionnaire, it can make a glaive attack against that creature.

monster.name: Soldier Vanguard
languages: Common and one Language of Choice

trait.name: Defender
entries: When the vanguard hits a creature with an attack, that creature suffers disadvantage on attacks against creatures other than the vanguard until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The vanguard has advantage on an attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the vanguard's allies are within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sentinel
entries: The vanguard can make an attack of opportunity, even if a creature disengages.

trait.name: Tactical Advantage
entries: The vanguard has advantage on initiative. If it takes the Attack action against a creature that has not acted yet in combat, the vanguard can make an additional spear or heavy crossbow attack on its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vanguard can make two weapon attacks with their spear. They can substitute any number of spear attacks for a crossbow attack

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, 10ft, one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage

action.name: Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, 100/400ft, one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage

reaction.name: Shield Wall
entries: When the vanguard or a creature within 5ft. of it takes damage, the vanguard can reduce the damage taken by 10. If the damage exceeds this amount, it can halve any of the excess damage.

monster.name: Guard
languages: Common and one Language of Choice

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The guard has advantage on an attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the guard's allies are within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sentinel
entries: The guard can make an attack of opportunity, even if a creature disengages.

trait.name: Vigil
entries: The guard has advantage on initiative and Wisdom(Perception) checks

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The guard can make two weapon attacks with their spear. They can substitute any number of spear attacks for a crossbow attack

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, 10ft, one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage

action.name: Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, 100/400ft, one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage

monster.name: Soldier Sharpshooter
languages: Common and one Language of Choice

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The sharpshooter has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight

trait.name: Precision
entries: The sharpshooter can ignore half and three-fourth's cover.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The sharpshooter has advantage on an attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the sharpshooter's allies are within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Tactical Advantage
entries: The sharpshooter has advantage on initiative. If it takes the Attack action against a creature that has not acted yet in combat, the sharpshhoter can make an additional shortsword or longbow attack on its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sharpshooter can make two weapon attacks with their shortsword. They can substitute any number of shortsword attacks for a longbow attack

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, 5ft, one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, 150/600ft, one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage

reaction.name: Reactive Shot
entries: Whenever a creature first enters or leaves within 30ft. of the sharpshooter, the sharpshooter can make a longbow attack as a reaction.

monster.name: Soldier Cavalier
languages: Common and one Language of Choice

trait.name: Agile
entries: While mounted, the cavalier can use its bonus action to Dash.

trait.name: Battle Mount
entries: While mounted, the cavalier and its mount both take actions on the same turn. Its mount can either before or after the cavalier's turn.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the cavalier moves at least 20ft. on its turn while mounted, it can deal an additional 9({@dice 2d8}) slashing damage on its next longsword attack. If the target is a creature, it must succeed a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Evasive
entries: While mounted, the cavalier and its mount does not provoke opportunity attack while moving outside a creature's reach.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The cavalier has advantage on an attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the cavalier's allies are within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Saddle Trained
entries: While mounted, both the cavalier and its mount have advantage on saving throws. Upon failing a saving throw, the cavalier and its mount takes half damage and upon a successful saving throw, they both take no damage.

trait.name: Tactical Advantage
entries: The cavalier has advantage on initiative. If it takes the Attack action against a creature that has not acted yet in combat, the cavalier can make an additional longsword or longbow attack on its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cavalier can make two weapon attacks with their longsword. The cavalier can substitute any number of longsword attacks for a longbow attack

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, 5ft, one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, 150/600ft, one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage

reaction.name: Battle Bond
entries: While mounted, the cavalier or their mount takes damage, the cavalier can use its reaction to split the damage between both targets.

monster.name: Soldier Skyknight
languages: Common and one Language of Choice

trait.name: Battle Mount
entries: While mounted, the skyknight and its mount both take actions on the same turn. Its mount can either before or after the skyknight's turn. Additionally, the skyknight's mount can benefit from Flyby, Skydive, and Pack Tactics if it does not possess these traits.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: While mounted, the skyknight does not provoke opportunity attacks by flying outside a creature's reach.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The skyknight has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks relying on sight.

trait.name: Skydive
entries: While mounted, if the skyknight's mount flies at least 30ft. on its turn while mounted, the skyknight can deal an additional 14({@dice 3d8}) slashing damage on its next longsword attack. If the target is a creature, it must succeed a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The skyknight has advantage on an attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the skyknight's allies are within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Saddle Trained
entries: While mounted, both the skyknight and its mount have advantage on saving throws. Upon failing a saving throw, the skyknight and its mount takes half damage and upon a successful saving throw, they both take no damage.

trait.name: Tactical Advantage
entries: The skyknight has advantage on initiative. If it takes the Attack action against a creature that has not acted yet in combat, the skyknight can make an additional longsword or longbow attack on its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skyknight can make two weapon attacks with their longsword. They can substitute any number of longsword attacks for a longbow attack

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, 5ft, one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, 150/600ft, one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage

reaction.name: Battle Bond
entries: While mounted, the skyknight or their mount takes damage, the skyknight can use its reaction to split the damage between both targets.

monster.name: Soldier Juggernaut
languages: Common and one Language of Choice

trait.name: Crushing Blows
entries: The juggernaut deals an additional 11({@dice 3d6}) damage on melee weapon attacks against {@condition prone} creatures or creatures one size smaller than it

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The juggernaut deals double damage to buildings and objects

trait.name: Heavy Armor
entries: The juggernaut can reduce bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage taken by 5.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The juggernaut has advantage on an attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the juggernaut's allies are within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Tactical Advantage
entries: The juggernaut has advantage on initiative. If it takes the Attack action against a creature that has not acted yet in combat, the juggernaut can make an additional maul or Double Crossbow attack on its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The juggernaut can make two weapon attacks with their maul. They can any number of maul attacks for a double crossbow attack

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, 10ft, one target. {@h}19 ({@dice 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning. Creatures hit by this attack must succeed a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Double Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, 50/200ft, one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage. Creatures hit by this attack must succeed a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be pushed back 5ft.

monster.name: Soldier Dreadnaught
languages: Common and one Language of Choice

trait.name: Defender
entries: When the dreadnaught hits a creature with an attack, that creature suffers disadvantage on attacks against creatures other than the dreadnaught until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Sentinel
entries: The dreadnaught can make an attack of opportunity, even if a creature disengages. Upon a hit, creatures must succeed a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or have its movement speed reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The dreadnaught has advantage on an attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the dreadnaught's allies are within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Tactical Advantage
entries: The dreadnaught has advantage on initiative. If it takes the Attack action against a creature that has not acted yet in combat, the dreadnaught can make an additional spear or Heavy Crossbow attack on its turn.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The dreadnaught can take a reaction at the end of every creatures turn.

trait.name: Spiked Shield
entries: Whenever a creature grapples or hits the dreadnaught while within 5ft. of the dreadnaught, it takes 4({@dice 1d6}) piercing damage

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreadnaught can make two weapon attacks with their halberd and one with its spiked shield. Alternatively, it can make two crossbow attacks.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, 10ft, one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spiked Shield
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, 5ft, one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage. Upon a hit, the target must succeed a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be pushed back 5ft.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, 100/400ft, one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Shield Block
entries: When the dreadnaught or a creature within 5ft. of it takes damage, the dreadnaught can reduce the damage taken by 10. If the damage exceeds this amount, it can halve any of the excess damage.

monster.name: Soldier Arbalester
languages: Common and one Language of Choice

trait.name: Close Quarter Shooter
entries: The arbalester can ignore range penalties on its ranged weapon attacks.

trait.name: Dead Shot
entries: The arbalester can deal a critical hit on a 18-20 on its ranged weapon attacks. Upon dealing a critical hit, the arbalester can triple the damage die.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The arbalester has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight

trait.name: Precision
entries: The arbalester can ignore half and three-fourth's cover.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The arbalester has advantage on an attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the arbalester's allies are within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Tactical Advantage
entries: The arbalester has advantage on initiative. If it takes the Attack action against a creature that has not acted yet in combat, the arbalester can make an additional longsword or a hand crossbow attack on its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The arbalester can make four weapon attacks with their longsword. They can substitute any number of longsword attacks for a hand crossbow attack

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, 5ft, one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, 240ft, one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage

reaction.name: Reactive Shot
entries: Whenever a creature first enters or leaves within 30ft. of the arbalester, the arbalester can make a hand crossbow attack as a reaction.

monster.name: Knight
languages: Common and one Language of Choice

trait.name: Defender
entries: When the knight hits a creature with an attack, that creature suffers disadvantage on attacks against creatures other than the knight until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Intrepid
entries: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}. If {@condition frightened}, the knight can still move towards the source of its fear.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the knight can deal an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the knight that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Resolute
entries: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}. Any time the knight takes damage while {@condition charmed} automatically ends the effect.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The knight has advantage on an attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the knight's allies are within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The knight can take a reaction at the end of each creature's turn.

trait.name: Tactical Advantage
entries: The knight has advantage on initiative. If it takes the Attack action against a creature that has not acted yet in combat, the knight can make an additional longsword or a heavy crossbow attack on its turn.

trait.name: Warrior's Spirit
entries: When the knight starts its turn below half its hitpoint maximum, it gains 20 temporary hitpoints at the start of each of its turns. While these temporary hitpoints are active, it has resistance to all damage and is immune to all conditions.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight can make a Rally Charge (if available) and three weapon attacks with their longsword. They can replace any number of longsword attacks for a heavy crossbow attack

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, 5ft, one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, 100/400ft, one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage

action.name: Rallying Charge{@recharge 5}
entries: Until the end of its next turn, the knight and any creature of its choice within 30ft. that can see or hear it gains 20 temporary hitpoints, its movement speed doubled, and advantage on all attack rolls and saving throws until the end of its next turn.
BONUS

action.name: Battle Command
entries: A creature within 30ft. that can see or hear the knight can use its reaction to move up to half its movement speed to make a weapon attack against a creature it can see. Upon a hit, the creature can deal an additional 14({@dice 4d6}) damage. This movement does not provoke opportunity attack

action.name: Fortification Command
entries: A creature within 30ft. that can see or hear the knight gains 20 temporary hitpoints until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Stalwart Command
entries: A creature within 30ft. that can see or hear the knight can end on condition on itself.

reaction.name: Retaliation
entries: When the knight or an ally within 5ft. of the knight is targeted with a melee attack while within 10ft. of the knight, it can make a longsword attack against that creature.

monster.name: Warlord
languages: Common and one Language of Choice

trait.name: Intrepid
entries: The warlord has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}. If {@condition frightened}, the warlord can still move towards the source of its fear.

trait.name: Legendary Resistances
entries: (3/day) Upon failing a saving throw, the Warlord can choose to succeed. Upon using this feature, the warlord can make a weapon attack. This weapon attack can benefit from its Martial Advantage.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the warlord can deal an extra 21 ({@damage 6d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the warlord that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Resolute
entries: The warlord has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}. Any time the warlord takes damage while {@condition charmed} automatically ends the effect.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The warlord has advantage on an attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the warlord's allies are within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The warlord can take a reaction at the end of each creature's turn.

trait.name: Tactical Advantage
entries: The warlord has advantage on initiative. If it takes the Attack action against a creature that has not acted yet in combat, the warlord can make an additional greatsword or a double crossbow attack on its turn.

trait.name: Warrior's Spirit
entries: When the warlord starts its turn below half its hitpoint maximum, it gains 30 temporary hitpoints at the start of each of its turns. While these temporary hitpoints are active, it has resistance to all damage and is immune to all conditions.

trait.name: Warmaster
entries: Whenever the deals additional damage using its Martial Advantage, it can inflict one of the following effects.

trait.name: - Cleave
entries: The warlord can make an additional attack against a creature within 5ft. of the original target. Upon a hit, that creatures takes the same damage as the first target.

trait.name: - Cripple
entries: Creature's hit by the warlord's weapon attack must succeed a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or have its movement speed halved until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: - Disorient
entries: Creature's hit by the warlord's weapon attack must succeed a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or suffer disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: - Trip
entries: Creature's hit by the warlord's weapon attack must succeed a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be pushed back 10ft. and fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warlord can make a Rally Charge (if available) and four weapon attacks with their greatsword. They can replace any number of greatsword attacks for a heavy crossbow attack

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, 5ft, one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage

action.name: Double Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, 50/200ft, one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage

action.name: Rallying Charge{@recharge 5}
entries: Until the end of its next turn, the warlord and any creature of its choice within 30ft. that can see or hear it gains 30 temporary hitpoints, its movement speed doubled, and advantage on all attack rolls and saving throws until the end of its next turn.
Legendary Actions(3/turn)

action.name: Battle Command(1 action)
entries: A creature within 30ft. that can see or hear the warlord can use its reaction to move up to half its movement speed to make a weapon attack against a creature it can see. Upon a hit, the creature can benefit from Martial Advantage. This movement does not provoke opportunity attack

action.name: Fortification Command(1 action)
entries: A creature within 30ft. that can see or hear the warlord gains 30 temporary hitpoints until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Resilience (1 LEGENDARY action)
entries: The warlord can end one status condition or spell effect on itself.

action.name: Stalwart Command(1 action)
entries: A creature within 30ft. that can see or hear the warlord can end on condition on itself.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Warlord gains a +2 bonus to its AC until the start of its next turn. Whenever a creature misses with a melee attack while within 5ft. of the warlord, the warlord can make a greatsword attack. Upon a hit, this attack can benefit from Martial Advantage.
